attributes.action: Abolish all MP expenses or resign or call immediate election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sick to my back teeth with stories of MP's claiming porn films, bbq's, pot plants, 4 houses, rent free living etc. It's time to either start running the government like most of us are having to live or leave the job to someone who will. Petition to either cancel all MP expense claims with immediate affect and close all loop holes or resign from PM or call immediate election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
